onboarding.slides.title: Welcome to your Cardano Foundation Identity Wallet
onboarding.slides.description: A secure and easy-to-use tool that allows you to manage your digital identity and control your personal data

onboarding.slides.title: Securerly manage your digital identity
onboarding.slides.description: Securely manage your digital identity and share your personal data with confidence

onboarding.slides.title: Take control of your personal data
onboarding.slides.description: Say goodbye to the days of handing over your personal data to third-party companies

onboarding.slides.title: Verify your identity with ease
onboarding.slides.description: Verify your identity for various online services, without sharing unnecessary personal information

onboarding.slides.title: Experience the power of decentralized identity
onboarding.slides.description: As a decentralized identity platform, you take control of your digital identity and your personal data

onboarding.getstarted.button.label: Get Started
onboarding.alreadywallet.button.label: I already have a wallet
setpasscode.enterpasscode.title: Create a passcode
setpasscode.reenterpasscode.title: Re-enter your passcode
setpasscode.startover.label: I cant remember, can I start over?
setpasscode.enterpasscode.description: Create a passcode to secure your wallet and to continue setting up your seed phrase
generateseedphrase.title: Generate Seed Phrase
generateseedphrase.paragraph.top: Think of your secret recovery phrase as a safety net for your identity. If you ever lose your phone or switch to a new wallet, this phrase will help you recover your identity.
generateseedphrase.paragraph.bottom: It's important to keep these words safe and sound! Store them in a secure location, like a password manager, and remember to never share them with anyone.
generateseedphrase.privacy.overlay.text: Press the 'view' button when you're ready to see your seed phrase. Remember to make sure nobody is looking!
generateseedphrase.alert.text: Have you double-checked you've copied your 15 word phrase correctly?
passcodelogin.title: Welcome back
passcodelogin.description: Please enter your passcode to login
passcodelogin.alert.text.verify: If you've forgotten your passcode, please verify your seed phrase to gain access to your wallet
passcodelogin.alert.text.restart: You currently haven't generated a seed phrase, would you like to start your onboarding again?
